desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了對策委員會一把。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“對策委員會”尚存抗争，但綾音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.jp: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.

The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.

The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.zh_tw: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.jp: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.thai: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在实验台上，低着头，怨恨自己的天真。他对不起對策委員會的所有人，也对不起曾经的学生会成员梦前辈。再一次地，她被大人骗了。

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.thai: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.ko: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.zh_tw: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.jp: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.thai: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.ko: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亞瑠抨击對策委員會“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亚瑠抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。爱露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
